name: The Crafting RPG
description:
Summary

The Crafting RPG (like the name implies) is an action-rpg with crafting elements. The goal of the game is to earn coins - which can be done through combat or trading with towns. Crafting weapons and brewing potions will make it easier to succeed.

Controls

  • Mouse 1 - Swing Equiped Item
  • Mouse 2 - Shield / Consume Equiped Item
  • F - Pickup
  • C - Equip  / Unequip
  • Q / E - Rotate

How to Win

  • Obtain the required number of coins - which is determined by the difficulty (see the bottom left text when in game).

How to Get Coins

  1. Sell crafted tools (weapons / potions) to the shop keeper
  2. Kill NPCs in a town

Note: You can gain a finite amount of money from each town. Check the town sign for more info.

How to...

  • Refine Wood - Cut down trees with axe and bring them to the saw
  • Refine Ore - Mine rocks with a pickaxe and bring the ore to the furnace (Note: the basket by the house is useful for transporting ore)
  • Brew Potions - Put a mushroom in the cauldron and dip a empty vial into it
  • Craft a Tool - Place materials on the anvil and hit it with the hammer.
  • Trade - Pickup, carry, and hand the crafted tool to the NPC shopkeeper

Player / Weapon Stats?

Player stats impact various aspects of gameplay. For example strength improves your damage and ability to mine / cut down trees. While speed increases movement and swing speed.

Weapon stats are very similar, but they are unique to the weapon you are using while players stats apply to all actions.

Implemented Craftables

  • Sword
  • Gold Sword
  • Mushroom on a Stick
  • Shroom Sword
  • Shield

Creator Notes :)

All code / assets were made by me. I am open to critiques on any aspect of the game, and open to suggestions as well!
